name: TaskDone
short_description:
A Javascript/node.js, web-enabled (but with CLI!) to-do list manager, including workflowing features and versatile work/task packaging/listing features.
The idea is that tasks are held as objects and can be associated into lists - so lists can encompass many objects, each with identifying properties and separate scopes.
This will make it easy for tasks to be delegated or passed to others, either singly or as lists/groupings, with suitable scoping giving security.
The idea further is that this will be scalable across multiple projects, delivered through a versatile web interface.
